headline: Terrible management

headline: Great first internship

Take more responsibility if you want

headline: Company is ran by 3 tyrants
cons: High turnover. Staff was told their positions will be outsourced to workers in Mexico. Most departments are ran by family and friends who are incompetent. Terrible culture
